The video was published on Facebook on N: 2020, with a caption describing a Hindu ceremony at the White House for Joe Biden's inauguration.
Sanskrit slokas: which are sacred texts in Hinduism, were chanted in the video, indicating a Hindu ceremony.
A reverse image search using InVID: WeVerify found a longer version of the video published on Facebook on October 15, 2014, with a description mentioning the Hindu American Seva Communities Conference at the White House.
The event was reported on by the US news: further confirming the authenticity of the video.
